Back to Gabriel Fauré

Gabriel Fauré

Sicilienne in G minor, op. 78

1898 · N 140b

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Fauré wrote the sicilienne for cello and piano (N 140a), and orchestrated it for his incidental music to Le Bourgeois gentilhomme (N 118) and Pelléas et Mélisande (op. 80; N 142). A contemporary arrangement for solo piano (N 140b) is perhaps also by Fauré.

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
